about_the_game:
Hunting dinosaurs it’s a multiplayer online game whose target is to protect primates (our ancestors) of dangerous dinosaurs who walk from one place to another in Jurassic, Cretaceous and Triassic era.
You have to keep alive primate who will be attacked for dangerous dinosaurs (T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Raptor, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, Pteranodon, Stegosaurus, Dimetrodon, Paradophosaurus, …).
You need another online cooperative player to help you to get the target. Points are shared for both.
You will have many weapons, ammi and bullets to use for preserving primates alive. And you will have to keep you alive alone yourself.
It’s a realistic game in 3D with free moving ad stereo sound.
You will have missions with different difficult levels.
And two differents worlds: last day and tropical forest.
You will feel danger and feel responsibility for your life and that of others at all times.
You can speak with your friends while you play this game.

name: Dinosaur Hunting Patrol 3D Multiplayer Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X o superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 o superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In an ancient world (Jurassic and Cretaceous) when dangerous dinosaurs lived for hunt and survive. You have to preserve your life and our ancestors primates in this world. You will have much weapons to hunt and defend. With zoom you can be more accurate. In dark jungle you can use light to see better.
